CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: MOT , CHI and INV enter the room . CHI kneels on the floor and plays with the jack+in+the+box . INV explains Warm-up task to MOT
<bef> MOT sits in the chair next to CHI
CHI looks down at the jack+in+the+box
<aft> MOT reaches down and turns handle of jack+in+the+box
CHI looks up and smiles at MOT . <aft> CHI leans on the floor
CHI sits up and looks at the jack+in+the+box . <aft> CHI pushes down on the lid
MOT pulls jack+in+the+box by the head and turns it to face CHI
CHI glances up at MOT briefly then looks at the jack+in+the+box
CHI pushes down the clown with one hand and tries to close the lid with the other
MOT pushes down the lid of the jack+in+the+box
<bef> MOT closes the lid and turns the handle once briefly
MOT leans back and looks at CHI
CHI tries to turn the handle
CHI puts one hand on the top of the box and tries to turn the handle
MOT removes CHI's hand from the lid
CHI starts to turn the handle then turns it back the wrong way
<$=1> MOT helps CHI turn the handle
CHI turns the handle with MOT
MOT looks down at the jack+in+the+box and leans back
CHI looks down at the jack+in+the+box
CHI pushes the clown's head in the jack+in+the+box
MOT closes the cover of the jack+in+the+box , taps it three times and then turns the handle briefly
CHI starts to turn the handle
CHI moves the handle back and forth but doesn't turn it
<aft> MOT takes handle from CHI and turns it
CHI sits back and watches MOT
<bef> MOT lets go of the handle
MOT sits back and looks at CHI
CHI starts to push the clown down
MOT holds the jack+in+the+box in her lap and looks down at it
CHI looks briefly at MOT then leans down on the floor
CHI picks up football throws it towards the door
CHI turns back around and leans down on the floor
MOT puts the jack+in+the+box on the table
MOT picks up the book on the floor
CHI looks up at the book on MOT's lap
MOT holds the book down on the floor and points to the cover
MOT looks down at the book
CHI crawls forward then opens the book
MOT's face is out of camera view
CHI looks down at the page
<aft> CHI leans forward and touches a picture in the book
CHI sits back and looks at the book
CHI nods slightly once and looks at the book
CHI points to a picture in the book
MOT points to the picture in book and looks at CHI
CHI points to the picture on the next page
MOT holds her hands on her lap and pulls back slightly
both MOT and CHI drop the final 'r' in car
CHI picks up the toy car and pushes it along the floor
CHI crawls along the floor pushing the car
<aft> CHI turns around to face MOT
CHI looks up at the camera as she speaks
MOT points to the picture and watches CHI
CHI looks over at MOT briefly
CHI pulls out the chair at the table
the jack+in+the+box is on the table
CHI climbs up into the chair
MOT puts her hands on the back of the chair
CHI pulls herself up onto the chair
<$=1> MOT puts her hands on the back of CHI's chair and helps CHI get into it
CHI turns herself around in the chair so that she faces the table
MOT pulls jack+in+the+box on table closer to CHI and at the same time pushes CHI's chair into the table
MOT's moving the jack+in+the+box makes a scraping noise that obscures speech
CHI reaches out for the jack+in+the+box
CHI puts her hand on the handle
<$=1> MOT puts her arms around CHI
<bef> CHI puts her hand up on top of the jack+in+the+box
CHI moves her hand to the side of the jack+in+the+box and starts to turn the handle
MOT turns the handle and holds the jack+in+the+box with CHI
<bef> MOT looks up at the camera
CHI watches MOT turning the handle and moves her head in
MOT cocks her head and leans close to CHI
CHI looks at jack+in+the+box and smiles
MOT holds the clown's head and looks at it
<aft> MOT pushes the clown in the jack+in+the+box and closes the lid
CHI helps MOT close the lid and then puts one hand on the handle and the other on the lid of the jack+in+the+box
MOT pulls CHI's hand off of the lid of the jack+in+the+box
MOT puts CHI's hand on the side of the jack+in+the+box
CHI turns the handle back and forth but not around
MOT helps CHI turn the handle .<aft> MOT stops turning the handle
MOT holds onto the side of the jack+in+the+box
CHI tries to turn the handle
MOT helps CHI turn the handle
MOT holds onto the side of the jack+in+the+box
CHI turns the handle with MOT
CHI's hand falls off of the handle
MOT turns the handle with CHI
CHI turns the handle with MOT
CHI looks down at the handle
CHI points to one of the clown's eyes
MOT looks down at the jack+in+the+box
CHI points to the clown's other eye with her other hand
MOT looks up towards the door
CHI reaches for the clown's head with both hands
<aft> CHI grabs the clown's head with one hand and grabs the lid of the jack+in+the+box with the other
MOT pulls CHI's hand off of the clown's head
<$=1> MOT leans close to CHI watching her
CHI is still pointing to the same place on the clown
CHI pulls the lid down on the jack+in+the+box
MOT taps the back of CHI's chair
CHI grabs the clown and starts to stuff it into the jack+in+the+box
MOT pulls one of CHI's hands off of the jack+in+the+box
CHI takes her other hand of the side of the box and pushes down on the clown's head
CHI lets go of the clown
CHI points to the clown's ear
CHI looks up at the face of the clown
CHI moves her hand near the clown's hand
<$=1> MOT pushes clown inside the jack+in+the+box and closes the lid
CHI tries to help MOT closes the lid . <aft> CHI puts turns the handle with one hand and puts the other hand on the lid
MOT pulls CHI's hand off of the top of the jack+in+the+box and moves it to the side
CHI turns the handle back and forth but not around
MOT helps CHI turn the handle
<bef> MOT stops turning the handle briefly and then starts again
CHI's hand slips off the handle
MOT stops turning the handle and puts CHI's hand back on it . <aft> MOT helps CHI turn the handle
CHI laughs sharply and in a high pitch
CHI stops turning the handle briefly
CHI looks down at the box part of the jack+in+the+box and points
CHI looks up at the jack+in+the+box and blinks once
MOT leans down close to CHI
CHI points to the box part of the jack+in+the+box
MOT points to the box part of the jack+in+the+box . <aft> MOT pulls back and watches CHI
<$=1> CHI points to something on the box part of the jack+in+the+box
CHI points to a different part of the box
CHI pushes the clown down and tries to close the lid
MOT closes the lid of the jack+in+the+box
CHI helps MOT close the lid . <aft> CHI puts her hand on the handle
CHI looks at the closed box briefly
CHI starts to turn the handle and places her other hand on top of the jack+in+the+box
CHI looks down at the handle
the jack+in+the+box moves around on the table
MOT pulls CHI's hand off of the top of the jack+in+the+box and moves it to the side
CHI turns the handle back and forth but not around and puts her hand back on top of the jack+in+the+box
MOT moves CHI's hand to the side of the jack+in+the+box
CHI tries to turn the handle
<bef> MOT grabs the handle and turns it with CHI . MOT stops turning the handle
CHI continues to turn the handle with MOT
MOT continues to turn the handle with CHI
MOT looks up at the door
MOT start to push the clown in the jack+in+the+box and close the lid
MOT pulls CHI's hand off of the jack+in+the+box and pulls the jack+in+the+box closer to CHI
CHI looks up at the clown
CHI looks at the clown then turns to looks at the door
CHI pushes the clown in the box
INV enters the room explains Small Scale Activity to MOT and picks up the toys from Warm-up .
INV leaves the room while Small Scale activity takes place
INV re-enters the room and explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT .
INV has MOT sit next to CHI at the table then gives CHI the necklace to hold
INV puts the Forbidden object on the table
CHI pulls on the necklace around her neck
CHI leans back and blinks her eyes at the object
CHI leans forward and stares at the object holding one hand up
CHI pulls on her necklace with one hand
MOT looks at the object and then to CHI
INV reaches out and grabs the toys that are still on the table
CHI looks at the toys on the table
<bef> MOT supports her head on her hand . MOT looks at INV and then at CHI
MOT looks at INV and then at CHI
INV takes the Forbidden Object off the table
INV puts the object in the drawer and closes it

INV tells MOT about Parent Child Interaction Boxes . INV picks up the toys from Small Scale Activity . MOT takes CHI out of the chair she was in for Small Scale Activity and sits in the other little chair . MOT gets up and walks to the desk
MOT takes the ball out of the box and walks across the room
CHI turns and looks towards MOT
MOT is out of camera view
CHI gets out of the chair and goes over to the activities table
CHI reaches out for the boxes on the table
CHI turns and looks towards MOT
MOT holds the ball out to CHI
MOT throws the ball into the air but cannot catch it
CHI turns to the table and looks at the other boxes
CHI tries to move the chair at the table out
CHI points to the other activity box and looks at MOT
CHI tries to climb up to the box
CHI begins to climb onto the chair
CHI takes the foam ball out of the Small Scale Activity box
CHI climbs down from the chair
CHI walks into the middle of the room with the ball
<bef> MOT throws the ball into the corner
MOT throws CHI's ball up on the desk
<bef> CHI picks up the PCI ball
CHI holds the PCI ball and turns around looking for the other ball
CHI turns around and looks at MOT
CHI turns and points up at the desk
CHI turns and looks at MOT
MOT points to the ball CHI is holding
CHI points the other ball on the table
MOT still out of camera view
CHI turns back towards the desk
CHI tries to open the desk drawer
<bef> CHI tries to open more drawers but they do not open
CHI turns and looks at MOT
<$=1> MOT takes the ball from CHI and puts it back into the box
<$=2> MOT takes a box down from the table and walks to the middle of the room
MOT puts the box on the floor
CHI walks over to MOT and sits on the floor
MOT takes the towel out of the box and puts it on the floor
CHI picks up the towel and starts to put it back into the box
MOT pulls the towel out of the box
CHI puts the towel into the box and closes the lid
MOT holds her head in her hands and looks down at the floor
MOT takes the towel out of the box
CHI closes the lid on the box
MOT holds the towel up in front of her face
MOT pulls the towel down to expose her eyes . <aft> MOT takes the towel off to expose her whole face
MOT looks up and then at CHI
<bef> CHI gets to her feet and runs off screen
CHI is out of camera view
MOT shakes her head and watches CHI
MOT holds out the towel and looks at CHI
MOT holds the towel on her lap and looks at CHI
CHI touches the chair at the table
MOT moves CHI back towards the desk
MOT puts CHI down on the floor
MOT holds the towel out and looks at CHI
CHI walks up to the desk
MOT takes the other box down and puts it on the floor
MOT puts the box on the floor
CHI tries to open the box
CHI looks in the box and reaches in it
MOT puts the towel in the box and closes the lid . <aft> MOT puts the peekaboo box on the desk
CHI puts a piece of paper on the floor beside her
MOT gets nearer to CHI and swings herself to face the camera . MOT looks up at the camera briefly
MOT picks up the paper on the floor and puts it in the box
CHI takes the crayons out of the box
MOT picks up a crayon from the floor
CHI looks down at a crayon in her hand
CHI puts her hand down on the paper to hold it
MOT holds the paper for CHI briefly then sits back and watches CHI
CHI stops drawing and picks up another crayon from the box
MOT picks up a crayon from the floor
CHI holds a crayon out to MOT
MOT points at the crayon CHI is holding out to her
CHI points the crayon towards herself and looks at it
MOT watches CHI then motions to hold the paper down but retracts her hand
CHI stops drawing then reaches for another crayon
MOT helps CHi pick up the crayon
CHI picks up the crayon and a piece of paper
MOT sits back and watches CHI
CHI drops the paper and the picks it up and moves it to the floor . <aft> CHI draws briefly
<aft> CHI turns and reaches for another crayon
MOT leans forward . <aft> MOT sits back and looks at CHI
MOT moves all the crayons near CHI and stacks the paper in the box
CHI takes another crayon from the box
MOT leans over and looks at the crayon in the box . MOt extends her hand towards the crayon the extracts it
CHI looks down at the crayon
<aft> CHI puts the crayon in the pile beside her
CHI holds out a crayon for MOT
CHI looks up at MOT . <aft> CHI looks down at the paper on the floor that is between her legs
MOT takes the crayon from CHI
CHI takes some paper out of the box
MOT takes the crayon from CHI
CHI pulls a piece of paper out for MOT
CHI puts a piece of paper near MOT
MOT takes the paper from CHI and puts it in front of her
CHI turns towards the pile of crayons behind her
CHI picks up a crayon from the floor
MOT turns and looks at CHI
CHI fixes the paper in front of her then draws
CHI stops drawing and reaches behind her and picks up another crayon
CHI examines the crayon she is holding
CHI draws with the crayon briefly then switches colors again
CHI stares down at the crayon in her hand
MOT puts her drawing in front of CHI
CHI looks at MOT then reaches for a crayon from the pile on the floor
<aft> MOT looks up towards the door
CHI picks up a crayon and hands it to MOT
MOT takes the crayon from CHI
CHI nods once and looks at MOT
MOT gives CHI the crayon in her other hand
CHI puts the crayon on the floor
<aft> CHI looks down at her leg
CHI picks up a crayon then draws
<bef> MOT stops drawing and slides her picture in front of CHI
CHI looks up at MOT and then points to MOT's picture with a crayon in her other hand
MOT reaches out for her paper
CHI raises the crayon to her face
MOT pulls the paper in front of her
CHI moves the crayon on her face
CHI brings the crayon down to her lap
CHI draws with one crayon the other
CHI looks up towards MOT's drawing
CHI picks up some paper and moves back on the floor with it
CHI accidentally sits in the lid of the box for about two seconds
<bef> MOT stops drawing and slides her paper towards CHI . <aft> MOT starts drawing again
CHI slowly turns to face MOT
CHI drops her crayon in the box then moves around on the paper
MOT stops drawing and slides the picture near CHI
CHI looks up at the paper
MOT points to the picture and leans closely to CHI looking at her
CHI looks at the picture and extends one hand towards it
MOT leans close to CHI looking at her
CHI puts the paper in the box
MOT drops her crayon into the box and piles up the paper
CHI throws a crayon in the box
MOT moves the crayon CHI threw
MOT sits back and watches CHI
CHI picks up a crayon and puts it on the floor under some paper
MOT puts a paper in the box and taps it
CHI picks up a bunch of crayons
<bef> CHI puts a crayon in the box the reaches in and takes it back out
<aft> CHI puts the crayon in the box
CHI takes a crayon out of the box
CHI examines the crayons in her hand
MOT puts a piece of paper in the box
CHI holds another crayon over the box
MOT looks up towards the wall
CHI puts the crayon in the box
MOT turns and looks up at the camera then back at CHI
<bef> CHI puts some paper in the box and then flips a piece over so that all pieces are facing the same way . CHI picks up another piece of paper from the floor
MOT pushes a paper in the box
CHI puts the paper in the box
CHI turns and looks behind her
CHI picks up some more paper and puts it in the box and then pushes on it
MOT fixes the paper in the box
CHI puts another piece of paper in the box then picks up the lid to close the box
MOT fixes the paper in the box
MOT looks at the last piece of paper on the floor
MOT picks up the paper and puts it in the box
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
CHI stands up and walks to the desk
MOT holds the box up and looks at CHI
CHI walks over to the desk
CHI looks up on top of the desk
MOT puts the crayons and paper box away and takes another box down and puts it on the floor
CHI walks over to MOT and sits on the floor
MOT leans forward and looks at the box
CHI takes the book out of the box
MOT pulls the box out of the way
CHI sits back letting go of the book
MOT's head blocks view of CHI
CHI starts to turn the page
CHI turns and looks at the door
<aft> MOT starts to turn the page
MOT looks up at the door
CHI turns and looks down at the book
MOT points to a page in the book then sits back and looks at CHI
CHI turns and looks up at the door
CHI points at the door and looks at MOT
MOT goes over to the book
CHI squats as she looks at the book
CHI points to the picture on the opposite page
CHI helps MOT push on the page
MOT separates two stuck together pages
MOT turns the book to face CHI
CHI sits back and looks at the book
CHI points to the next page
MOT points to the picture on the next page
<$=1> MOT points to the picture and looks at CHI
CHI starts to turn the page
MOT tries to turn the page
CHI takes the book from MOT
MOT lets go of the book
CHI lifts up one side of the book trying to close it
MOT pulls the page back with her finger
MOT starts to open the book
CHI helps MOT open the book
CHI starts to close the book
CHI closes the book and stands up
CHI puts the book into the box
